mapper.select: SELECT G.GOODS_ID AS GOODS_ID, G.GOODS_TITLE AS GOODS_TITLE, G.GOODS_WRITER AS GOODS_WRITER, G.GOODS_PRICE AS GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_PUBLISHER AS GOODS_PUBLISHER, G.GOODS_SORT AS GOODS_SORT, G.GOODS_SALES_PRICE AS GOODS_SALES_PRICE, G.GOODS_POINT AS GOODS_POINT, G.GOODS_PUBLISHED_DATE AS GOODS_PUBLISHED_DATE, G.GOODS_TOTAL_PAGE AS GOODS_TOTAL_PAGE, G.GOODS_ISBN AS GOODS_ISBN, G.GOODS_DELIVERY_PRICE AS GOODS_DELIVERY_PRICE, G.GOODS_DELIVERY_DATE AS GOODS_DELIVERY_DATE, G.GOODS_STATUS AS GOODS_STATUS, G.GOODS_WRITER_INTRO AS GOODS_WRITER_INTRO, G.GOODS_CONTENTS_ORDER AS GOODS_CONTENTS_ORDER, G.GOODS_INTRO AS GOODS_INTRO, G.GOODS_PUBLISHER_COMMENT AS GOODS_PUBLISHER_COMMENT, G.GOODS_RECOMMENDATION AS GOODS_RECOMMENDATION, G.GOODS_CREDATE AS GOODS_CREDATE, D.FILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME FROM T_SHOPPING_GOODS G INNER JOIN T_GOODS_DETAIL_IMAGE D ON G.GOODS_ID = D.GOODS_ID AND D.FILE_TYPE = 'main_image' AND G.GOODS_STATUS = #{goodsStatus} ORDER BY G.GOODS_CREDATE DESC
